EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-05-15 Intro to Containers and Serverless.5/15 Last Chance - Marketo.Ema
EmailTemplate.subject: 2 hours to go! Introduction to Containers and Serverless
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-intro-containers-serverless-2/]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-intro-containers-serverless-2/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Join us TODAY at 11am to get your introduction to containers and serverless and how these technologies impact your multicloud strategy.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-intro-containers-serverless-2/]]>
We’ll offer an overview of the drivers and best practices when leveraging these technologies. I hope you'll join us! Register now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-intro-containers-serverless-2/]]> and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card.
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-intro-containers-serverless-2/]]> and we will send you the recording afterward.
